Direct Known Subclasses:
Aggregator, CTRWPeerSampler, CTRWSamplerOverlay, FindMinPull, FindMinPush, FindMinSymmetric, MergeCorrelated, MergeGeneric, MergeIndependent, MinAddressLeaderElection, NaiveBroadcast, SpanningTreeOverlay, TestRuntimeStateProtocol, TestSelectMethod, TreeLabelNodes
public abstract class BaseProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
implements Protocol, java.io.Serializable

Base for all MiCA protocols. Extend this class to create your own protocol.

Author:
lonnie

Method Detail

getRuntimeState

public final RuntimeState getRuntimeState()
Description copied from interface: Protocol
RuntimeState is location-specific state that is independent of the protocol instance. This includes the runtime clock and random number generator.

Specified by:
getRuntimeState in interface Protocol
Returns:
Local node's runtime state.

rate

public double rate()
The default rate of all protocols is 1.0. Override this only if you specifically want to make this protocol gossip at a non-uniform rate (i.e., merge operators do this)

Returns:

getLogState

public java.lang.Object getLogState()
Description copied from interface: Protocol
Returns an object that represents local node state. By default, the instance itself. This will be JSON-serialized into the log. Circular references cause serialization to break; in that case, this function will need to be overridden or the offending fields marked as transient.

Specified by:
getLogState in interface Protocol
Returns:
JSON-serializable object representing node state for logging purposes
